message.content:
cs.GT, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.DS

The paper proposes a novel approach that combines game theory and machine learning to learn an auction mechanism for revenue maximization in sponsored search. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.GT (Game Theory and Economics), followed by cs.LG (Machine Learning), as the proposed approach involves learning a Markov model from historical data and using a Genetic Programming algorithm to optimize the empirical revenue. The paper also deals with information retrieval (IR) and artificial intelligence (AI) topics, as it focuses on sponsored search and auction mechanisms. Finally, the paper involves data structures (DS) as it deals with predicting bid sequences and optimizing revenue.
